actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide double credit for retirement purposes, and certain pay and allowances, to Federal employees who are in missing status for any period of time during the Vietnam Conflict.

summary.text: Provides double credit for retirement purposes, and pay and allowances purposes, to Federal employees who were in missing status for any period of time during the Vietnam conflict.

titles.title: A bill to provide double credit for retirement purposes, and certain pay and allowances, to Federal employees who are in missing status for any period of time during the Vietnam Conflict.
